## DocumentReplica.getKey() method

`getKey` returns the key of this document as a string. The string is a combination pattern of collection and document. e.g. `Collection$Document`<!-- -->;

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getKey(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string
